beats.text: |VS| You find some nuts under a tree. $hero_name tries to open it |VS| ‘This nut is a fighter. Look at it. Thick skin. It knows I want what is inside. But I am patient, Little man-cub. Hold it steady’ |VS| said $hero_name forcing the nut to crack with their feet.
‘Hah! Did you hear that? The shell is cracking. Let me hit it again! I will use the weight of my foot. Let gravity do the work!’
‘Mmm. Worth it. Sweet as honey. Can you see? The rock gives us tools if we know how to ask’ Let's go find the next page, maybe we’ll also find more food this $storyTime while we walk.’
|VS| $hero_name licked his chops, before stating |VS| ‘I'm still hungry, though. That was just a snack.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 10  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
